pages.title: Cross-pollination
pages.text: A pollen jar is a vital item in obtaining hybridized flowers.$(br2)An empty pollen jar may be used to collect pollen by holding it in the hand and using it on a vanilla flower.$(br2)The flower will be unaffected by this.
$(br)Filled pollen jars can also be crafted back into empty pollen jars.

The first step, collecting pollen, is what influences the color of resulting seeds.$(br)$(li)$(#B02E26)Red$(): Poppy, Red Tulip, Rose Bush$(li)$(#F9801D)Orange$(): Orange Tulip, Torchflower$(li)$(#FED83D)Yellow$(): Dandelion, Sunflower$(li)$(#169C9C)Cyan$(): Pitcher Plant$(li)$(#3C44AA)Blue$(): Cornflower$(li)$(#3AB3DA)Light blue$(): Blue Orchid$(li)$(#C74EBD)Magenta$(): Allium, Lilac$(li)$(#F38BAA)Pink$(): Peony, Pink Petals, Pink Tulip$(li)$(#9D9D97)White$(): Azure Bluet, Lily of the Valley, Oxeye Daisy, White Tulip$(li)$(#1D1D21)Black$(): Wither Rose

There is a 10% chance to mutate into a secondary color.$(br)$(li)$(#80C71F)Lime$(): Dandelion, Sunflower$(li)$(#169C9C)Mint$(): Blue Orchid$(li)$(#8932B8)Lavender$(): Peony, Pink Petals, Pink Tulip$(li)$(#8932B8)Purple$(): Cornflower, Pitcher Plant$(li)$(#C74EBD)Lilac$(): Allium, Lilac$(li)$(#F38BAA)Peach$(): Poppy, Red Tulip, Rose Bush$(li)$(#835432)Wilted$(): Wither Rose$(br2)There is also a 2% chance to mutate into the rare multicolor from any of the pollens.

The second step, using a filled pollen jar on a vanilla flower, influences the species of flower for the resulting seeds.$(br2)There is a 20% chance to mutate into a hybrid flower species.$(br)$(li)$(l)Alyssum$(): Pink Petals$(li)$(l)Blazing Star$(): Sunflower$(li)$(l)Bougainvillea$(): Orange Tulip$(li)$(l)Bromeliad$(): Torchflower$(li)$(l)Chicory$(): Cornflower$(li)$(l)Clematis$(): White Tulip$(li)$(l)Clover$(): Oxeye Daisy

$(li)$(l)Daffodil$(): Allium$(li)$(l)Dianthus$(): Azure Bluet$(li)$(l)Fairy Rose$(): Wither Rose$(li)$(l)Foxglove$(): Peony$(li)$(l)Hibiscus$(): Lily of the Valley$(li)$(l)Hyacinth$(): Red Tulip$(li)$(l)Impala Lily$(): Pitcher Plant$(li)$(l)Jasmine$(): Pink Tulip$(li)$(l)Lantanas$(): Blue Orchid$(li)$(l)Lavender$(): Lilac$(li)$(l)Poppies$(): Poppy$(li)$(l)Rose$(): Rose Bush$(li)$(l)Rose Bushlet$(): Rose Bush$(li)$(l)Wildflower$(): Dandelion
